title: Remedy Juice Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Indian, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Spanish
description: A bright and cheery 98% vegan juice bar/cafe offers juices and smoothies using organic and local ingredients, coffee, and kombucha on tap. The only non-vegan items are cheese and yogurt, which can easily be omitted. Artisan almond and coconut milk are made-in-house daily, with no added ingredients, preservatives or thickeners. Lunch offerings include bowls, salads and soup.
